Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: mgao
Reviews.Content: this is a good product .exactly good appearance but the only regretting thing is - i did not receive any accessories in addition to one battery. but fortunately i have cables and headset for palm already so i can live with it

ProductInfo.Features:
Simplifies your life by combining a compact mobile phone with email, an organizer, messaging, and web access
The vibrant color screen brings everything to life all in a device that is still small enough to fit in your pocket
ProductInfo.Name: Treo 650 Cingular At&t Cell Phone Pda Palmone
